trans-unit.source: Provides the base implementation for the factory that allows application code to participate in the creation of service hosts in managed hosting environments where the host instance is created dynamically in response to incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 提供處理站的基底實作，這個實作可讓應用程式程式碼參與 Managed 裝載環境中服務主機的建立，在這個環境中會動態建立主機執行個體以回應傳入訊息。

trans-unit.source: The managed hosting environments that support this interface are Internet Information Services (IIS) or Windows Process Activation Services (WAS).
trans-unit.target: 支援這個介面的 Managed 裝載環境包括網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 或 Windows Process Activation Services (WAS)。

trans-unit.source: Implement a factory that derives from this class when you have implemented a custom derivative of <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> in these hosting environments.
trans-unit.target: 當您已在這些裝載環境中實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> 的自訂衍生時，實作衍生自這個類別的處理站。

trans-unit.source: If you have implemented a custom derivative of <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>, consider deriving from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactory> instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> 的自訂衍生，請考慮改從 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactory> 衍生。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactoryBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactoryBase" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The initialization data that is passed to the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> instance being constructed by the factory.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至由處理站所建構之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> 執行個體的初始化資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses of the host.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，其中包含主機的基底位址。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> with a specific base address using custom initiation data.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，使用自訂的初始化資料建立含有指定基底位址的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> object with the specified base addresses and initialized with the custom initiation data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> 物件，含有指定基底位址並以自訂的初始化資料進行初始化。
